        (ADVP (RB so) (RB far)))
      (S
        (NP (PRP we))
        (VP (VBP have)

            (NP (DT the) (NN $))))))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP$ our) (NNS sponsors) (NN MHCAsia))

      (VP (VBN been)
        (ADJP (RB very) (JJ generous))
        (PP
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP (PRP$ their) (NN support)))
          (CC and)
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NN lead))
              (ADVP (RB up)
                (PP (TO to)
                  (NP (PRP$ their) (JJ Annual) (NN Dinner)))))))
        (NP (JJ next) (NN week))))
    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (INTJ (VB Please))
    (VP (VB do)
      (NP
        (NP (JJ spare) (DT a) (NN minute))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (PRP$ your) (NN time)
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB do)
                  (NP (DT this)))))))))
    (. !)))

pobj(of-6, time-8)
aux(do-10, to-9)
infmod(time-8, do-10)
dobj(do-10, this-11)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (JJ Many) (NNS thanks))
    (PP (IN for)
      (NP (PDT all) (PRP$ your) (NN support)))
    (. !)))


amod(thanks-2, Many-1)
root(ROOT-0, thanks-2)
prep(thanks-2, for-3)
predet(support-6, all-4)
poss(support-6, your-5)
pobj(for-3, support-6)
